pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Estimation of Large Time Series Models // Estimation of large Vector AutoRegressive (VAR), Vector AutoRegressive with Exogenous Variables X (VARX) and Vector AutoRegressive Moving Average (VARMA) Models with Structured Lasso Penalties, see Nicholson, Wilms, Bien and Matteson (2020) https://jmlr.org/papers/v21/19-777.html and Wilms, Basu, Bien and Matteson (2021) doi:10.1080/01621459.2021.1942013.
